message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,000?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints but I can't go as low as $11,000. Could you do $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,500?
